column1: ADHD is a problem that most often affects children.
TYPES OF MEDICINES Stimulants are the most commonly used type of ADHD medicine.
Children with ADHD often forget to take their medicines.
But be aware that your child may not understand when he or she is having side effects.
Call the provider right away if your child does have side effects.
To ensure your child uses medicines safely: - Talk to your child about the dangers of drug abuse.
